Text:
To make this hack work for the latest update of CallBurner, follow these steps with the .exe in this torrent:

Open the .exe in a hex editor and go to 0x1AAE04. You'll see 74 1D; change it to 90 90. Save, done.

> Open the .exe in a hex editor

how about recommending a user-friendly hex editor? preferably a portable one. thanks.

I don't see any 0x1AAE04 with UltraEdit pro 10...but there are many 74 1D...
MODUSOPERANDl, could you pliz upload the corrected file ?
best regards
